title: Interpretation of a dream about eating beans with eggs in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about eating beans with eggs in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about eating beans with eggs in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about eating beans with eggs in a dream: Eating cooked beans indicates goodness. And happiness, God willing. When the dreamer sees himself eating beans in a dream, this may be evidence of good news, and God knows the unseen. Likewise, if a married man sees himself eating cooked beans and they taste good, this may indicate goodness and care, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. As he can express what He obtains money and good things, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about buying beans in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about buying beans in a dream could be a reference to a new job and livelihood, and God knows the unseen. Likewise, if the dreamer sees himself buying beans from a large market, this may lead to exhaustion and unhappiness in earning money and living, and God knows best. The Most High and Most Knowing When you see a married man buying beans, this may indicate the satisfaction of desires, and God Almighty is All-Knowing. When you see a single girl buying beans, this may be marriage, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about dry beans in a dream. The vision of soaking dry beans can also represent the healing of causes of anxiety, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about eating beans in a dream. If a married man sees beans growing in the summer in a dream, this may be evidence of fatigue, and God knows the unseen, while seeing beans growing in the winter portends goodness. God willing. Interpretation of a dream about seeing green beans in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about seeing green beans in a dream can be a sign of getting rid of worries, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees green beans, it can lead to the satisfaction of desires, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When a married woman sees green beans in a dream, it could be This is evidence that she is getting rid of problems, and God knows the unseen. If a single girl sees green beans, this may mean that she will get rid of stress, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a bean seller in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a bean seller in a dream. We did not find any specific explanations for seeing this. However, seeing beans sold may indicate the need for money, and God knows the unseen. The need may also appear for some people all the time, and God knows the unseen. When you see beans sold it may mean that you are rejecting your relationship with someone, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream Seeing a bean plant in a dream. title: Interpretation of a dream about raw meat in the home of senior interpreters

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about raw meat at homeInterpretation of dreams about raw meat at home Seeing raw meat in a dream is one of the dreams that has been repeated in the dreams of many of us, so we wanted to clarify interpretations and interpretations of seeing raw meat in a dream. According to dream interpretation books, it refers to this vision. Seeing someone from the dreamer's family eating raw sheep means that this person's death is approaching. You can follow the article on the interpretation of a dream about raw meat at home through: Otherwise, the interpretation of seeing raw meat in a dream without eating it. Most dream interpreters believe that seeing raw meat in a butcher shop indicates that some misfortunes will happen to the dreamer one after another. Eating raw meat in a dream also indicates a serious illness that may be difficult for the dreamer to deal with. If this raw meat is available among family or friends, this indicates the spread of gossip and gossip, especially among those who eat this raw meat. Dream interpreters also argue that raw meat in a dream indicates a bad reputation among people, which characterizes the dreamer, due to his corrupt morals.Interpretation of a dream of cutting raw meat with a knifeInterpretation of dreams with raw meat in the home, this indicates the dreamer’s approaching death, because the butcher in the dream refers to an angel death. However, if the dreamer is single and sees that he is cutting raw meat in his dream, this indicates that the age of marriage for that girl has been postponed. If the dreamer sees that he is cutting raw meat in his dream, this means that the dreamer has made many wrong decisions in his life, and this decision has It affects him negatively in the future. Seeing a married woman cutting raw meat in her kitchen indicates that many problems will arise between this woman and her husband in the coming period. Seeing raw meat pieces in a dream. Al-Nabulsi believes that the presence of raw meat in the dreamer’s house indicates that the people of that house will suffer from extreme poverty in the coming period. Raw meat in the house can indicate bad habits of all members of this house, young and old. Ibn Shaheen believes that raw meat in a house portends misfortune for a member of that house. Seeing someone dividing raw meat into meat, which is cat or dog meat, means that the dreamer has committed many sins to whomever appears. Distributing raw meat to people in a dream indicates that the dreamer is misbehaving with the people who give him this raw meat. Distributing raw meat to people indicates that the dreamer will be exposed to a major scandal among people in the coming period. In addition, distributing raw meat in a dream indicates that the dreamer will hear very disturbing news in the coming period. Seeing meat in a dream for a married woman. Interpretation of dreams about raw meat in Home If a married woman sees in her dream that she is cutting raw meat with a knife, this means that her soul is suffering from some psychological crises and problems and she does not want to reveal them. A woman cutting meat with a knife indicates that she is currently dissatisfied with life

title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about money from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about money Interpretation scholars argue that most dream interpretations bode well despite the presence of some negative meanings, and in the lines of this article we will talk about the interpretation of seeing money in a dream for single people, married people, pregnant women, divorced women, and men, according to Ibn Sirin. And the leading scholars of interpretation. Interpretation of a dream about money by Ibn Sirin. What is the interpretation of a dream about money? Money in a dream indicates an abundance of sustenance, and it promises the dreamer an increase in his money and success in practical life, as it indicates victory over competitors and victory over enemies. The vision shows a response to an invitation that the dreamer had asked From the Lord (the mighty and the great) for a long time and I think it will not be answered, but God Almighty will turn his eyes to see the desire for it. It will soon become a reality. If the dreamer sees a lot of money in his dream, this means that he talks a lot and often talks about what does not concern him, and the dream is a warning to change himself and abandon this bad habit. Interpretation of a dream about money by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that money in a dream symbolizes To rest. If the dreamer is going through a crisis in his life and sees that he is holding money in his hands, this means that he is close to getting out of this crisis due to the strength of his will, patience, and adherence to hope. If the dreamer finds money and does not feel happy in his dream, this means that he will face a small problem in the coming period, but it is It will end quickly and will not affect his life negatively. Egyptian website, the largest website specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world. Just write. Egyptian dream interpretation website. Search on Google and get the correct interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about money for a single woman. The dream foretells the dreamer that she will soon be able to achieve her ambition and achieve the goals that she was struggling with. For her sake and she makes a lot of effort for her. If she sees herself in need of money in the dream, it means that she feels confused and hesitant about something and cannot make a decision. Finding money in a dream indicates that a single woman will soon find a solution to a big problem in Her life was worrying her and stealing sleep from her eyes, but she will enjoy happiness and peace of mind after it is resolved. Interpretation of a dream about banknotes for single women indicates that she is close to marrying a rich man who has a lot of money and works in a prestigious job with a large financial income. He will make her days happy and fulfill all her dreams. The dream shows the possession of things Precious, but if she sees herself taking money from someone, this means that she benefits a lot from this person and will contribute a lot to improving her health and psychological condition. Interpretation of a single woman’s dream of coins: The dream indicates that the dreamer will face some problems in her professional life, but she will get rid of them by overcoming all The obstacles that stand in her way because she is a strong and hardworking girl. Many coins in the vision indicate that the single woman is educated, intelligent, and has a lot of knowledge, and the dream carries a message for her urging her to benefit people with her knowledge so that she will be rewarded in this life and beyond. Interpretation of a dream about money for a married woman: The vision may indicate that she is going through financial difficulties

title: Interpretation of seeing a criminal in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a criminal in a dream: What does it mean? Through our article, we will explain in detail the different indicators and interpretations of seeing a goblin in a dream, because they differ depending on the nature of the dream and the dreamer. Interpretation of seeing a villain in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing a goblin in a dream as evidence of the presence of enemies around this person and creating problems for him. Dreaming of goblins and reading the Qur’an in The dream is evidence that the problems facing the dreamer have disappeared. Seeing yourself touching an elf in a dream is evidence that the person has been lied to and deceived by those close to him. A person who dreams that he has turned evil is a sign of strength. When one sees in a dream that the elf has managed to Attacking him, this is a sign of his enemy’s victory over him. Marrying a thug in a dream indicates that this person will not repent. A pregnant woman who dreams of wearing jeans will be a sign of her faltering and difficult birth. The dreamer talking to a goblin is evidence of an oath that the dreamer did not fulfill. When he dreams If a goblin takes off his clothes, this indicates something bad or a major financial loss. A goblin performing magic in a dream for someone is evidence of that person’s superiority and success. To dream that you are afraid of goblins means that there are many enemies around the dreamer. Interpretation of a dream about a goblin for a woman Single An unmarried woman who sees goblins attacking her is evidence that there are people causing her problems. Seeing an unmarried woman in a dream, a goblin in the house, indicates her relationship with a person who is not suitable for her. Burning a dwarf in a dream for a single woman indicates strength and the ability to do what she wants. Seeing A dwarf in a dream for a married woman. A married woman who sees goblins around the house in her dream is evidence that she will suffer from incurable diseases. A married woman who dreams that she is talking to a genie indicates that she is talking to someone she hates and is causing her problems. A dwarf in a married woman’s dream is a sign that she Many misdeeds and misdeeds are committed. Interpretation of seeing a serial killer in a dream for a man: A man who dreams of reciting the Qur’an to an antichrist is evidence of his preservation and protection. A dwarf takes off a man’s clothes in a dream, and this indicates that the man will lose a lot of money and bad things will happen to him. A man who dreams of a magician is an indicator To fulfill this man’s dreams. Seeing a dream about a goblin and reading the Qur’an To dream of a goblin reading the Qur’an is evidence of the strength of this person’s faith and dedication. When a ghoul appears in a dream to a person reading the Qur’an, this is evidence of this person’s trust and help always in God. The person who dreams of reading the two incantations when Seeing a goblin is a sign of that person's distance from sins and transgressions. A married woman who dreams of turning her husband into a terrifying cheater is evidence that she does not live happily and stably with her husband, but when she reads the two dream spells in a dream, problems will be solved and stability and peace will return. Seeing a house elf if we dream The presence of goblins in the house, it means that there are many enemies who visit the house and infect the dreamer with evil. The touch of the dreamer's goblins in his house is a sign of the machinations of relatives

title: Interpretation of a dream about garlic

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing garlic in a dream: Garlic also has many interpretations when seen in a dream, including money and livelihood, and seeing cooked garlic indicates repentance from sins. The dream of these visions and their interpretations come from major dream interpretation scholars such as Ibn Sirin. It is important when reading these interpretations not to make inferences. It must be available and the dream interpreter must be fully aware of it. Interpretation of seeing garlic in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that the interpretation of seeing garlic in a dream has different meanings, including that cooked garlic in a dream indicates that the dreamer will repent for the sins he has committed. As for Eating raw garlic in a dream is evidence of a forbidden food. Ibn Sirin also says that raw garlic in a dream symbolizes sickness. Peeling garlic when you see it in a dream, this may be a sign that the dreamer is always treated well. The appearance of garlic in a dream, this may be It has connotations indicating receiving good news - God willing. Seeing garlic in a dream for a single woman. When an unmarried girl dreams that she is eating garlic, this may be a harbinger of good things that will come to that girl - God willing. A single girl who desperately wants to get married sees garlic in a dream. This foretells the approaching date of engagement - God willing. A single person’s dream of eating garlic may indicate that he will marry the man he loves. Seeing garlic in a dream for a married woman. A married woman sees in her dream that she is cooking garlic, this may be a person - God willing - with good luck who will This woman will achieve it in life. Just like a married woman eating garlic in a dream, this may be an indication that this woman is hated among her family and neighbors. If a married woman dreams that she is peeling garlic, this may be a sign that she will get a lot of money and her husband will get A prominent position - God willing. A married woman cuts garlic in a dream. This may be an unpleasant dream that indicates her separation from her husband, God forbid. Seeing garlic in a dream for a man. When a man sees in a dream that he is working on a garlic farm and pulling garlic, this may be a dream. Annoying indicates that he will be fired from work, God forbid. Also, a man eats garlic in a dream, this may be an indication that there are some people discussing him. A man who plants garlic in a dream could be a man whose condition will change for the better - God willing. When he sees A righteous person sees garlic in a dream. This may be news of good luck - God willing - in life. Just like picking garlic from the field in a dream, this may be an indication of an abundance of food and collecting money, and God knows best.

title: The 100 most important interpretations of a dream about henna on the hands for a single woman

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about henna on the hands for a single woman. Seeing henna in a dream is one of the good dreams that carry a lot of goodness for the dreamer in most cases, and scholars differed in its interpretation according to the details of the dream and the dreamer’s condition. Interpretation of the dream about henna on the hands for a single woman: Seeing henna on the hands of unmarried women in a dream, And it was beautiful, a sign of the approaching date of her wedding. Henna in a dream symbolizes for a girl who has nothing to do with happy news and happy occasions that cause her psychological state to change for the better. If a girl sees in her dream that she is carrying a bowl with henna and begins to put her hands in it, this is a clear sign that she is making Everything in her power to change her lifestyle and improve her standard of living. If an unmarried woman dreams that she is putting henna on her fingers, she will have the opportunity to travel to a distant city, which in reality may be her or someone from her family. If an unmarried woman studies and dreams of putting henna on her hands In an attractive and harmonious way, she will achieve overwhelming success from an academic standpoint and reach prestigious places. If an unrelated girl draws henna on her hands and it is not appropriate, this is a sign that she will marry someone who is not suitable for her in the future. Interpretation of a dream about henna on the hand of an unmarried woman According to Ibn Sirin, the great scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin gave several interpretations of the dream of henna on the hands of single women, which are as follows: The interpretation of the dream of henna on the hands of a single woman symbolizes the generosity of her morals, her commitment, and her closeness to God, which leads to intense love for those around her. If a girl sees that she is putting henna on her hands, then this A sign that her marriage will be easy and she will live a good and happy life with her partner. If you dream of a girl who is not tied with henna and has a beautiful appearance, this is a sign that she will obtain wishes and the fruits of her research in a short time. In the event that an unmarried woman suffers from worries and sorrows, this vision indicates On her readiness for everything that disrupts her life and the stability of the situation in the near future. Interpretation of a dream about henna on the hands of a single woman by Ibn Shaheen. The scholar Ibn Shaheen provides explanations and evidence regarding seeing henna on the hands of single women, which are as follows: An unmarried woman who sees henna on her hands indicates a lot of kindness and benefits that You will get it in the near future. And if the unmarried woman works and sees henna on her hands in a dream, she will soon occupy the highest positions in her work, and the vision also symbolizes achieving more material gains. Interpretation of a dream about henna on the hand of an unmarried woman according to Al-Nabulsi, according to the opinion of the scholar Abdul Ghani Al-Nabulsi there There are many meanings of a dream about henna on the hands of a single woman, which are: Seeing an unrelated girl in a dream applying henna to her hands means that she is pure, chaste, watches God in all her actions, and refuses to enter into forbidden relationships. Seeing black henna in a girl’s dream means that her circumstances will change for the worse and her life will be turned upside down. After. Al-Nabulsi also says that if an unmarried woman sees henna on her hands, this is a sign of healing and prosperity. Interpretation of a dream about henna

title: Interpretation of a broken engagement ring in a dream or breaking an engagement ring in a dream

preview.html: Seeing an engagement ring broken or an engagement ring breaking indicates changes that will happen soon in your life and more interpretations that we will explain to the single girl to the married woman to the pregnant woman to the divorced man such as breaking a silver engagement ring, seeing a wedding ring broken or returning an engagement ring, and seeing a ring in general in a dream By Ibn Sirin, and more in continuation of the topic: Interpretation of a broken engagement ring in a dream If you dream that your engagement ring has broken and that you are recently engaged and in the process of getting married, this may just be a simple dream related to the changes that will occur in your life. Seeing a broken engagement ring in a dream means You may be concerned about the meaning and longevity of your relationship. Breaking an engagement ring in a dream and lighting parts of the ring and diamonds is a symbol of eternity, and the image of diamonds scattered on the ground may relate to your concerns about the seriousness of the relationship. You may be concerned that the relationship will lose its luster even if it continues, especially if you see In a dream you actually found a broken diamond from the ring, but it no longer sparkles. Dreaming of a broken engagement ring represents toughness, willpower and determination to succeed. Breaking an engagement ring in a dream means that you may have more clarity about a problem or situation that has been bothering you, you are keeping Do it for yourself and do not tell others, but it hurts you inside and causes you psychological fatigue. Breaking an engagement ring in a dream It indicates strength and that you must gather your strength and defend yourself. Whoever sees that the engagement ring is broken in his dream, this means that he needs better control over his internal emotions, and it indicates The dream indicates that he will face difficulties and setbacks in achieving his goals. Dreaming of a broken engagement ring means that you are clinging to the past or false hope. Seeing a broken ring in a dream is evidence that you should be more disciplined or obedient. Dreaming of a broken engagement ring in a dream indicates tenderness, love, and care and indicates That you lack a love similar to a mother's love. Anyone who sees that his engagement ring is broken in a dream, this means that something or someone in your environment is manipulating you and hiding facts from you. A broken engagement ring in a dream means that someone is watching you and waiting for you to make a mistake in order to take advantage. Of opportunity. The dream also expresses an improvement in your current situation. Dreaming of an engagement ring symbolizes kindness, compassion, mercy and humanity, while breaking a ring means that someone is taking advantage of you. Breaking an engagement ring symbolizes some adventures or romantic relationships and suggests that you have gained some insight and knowledge on a topic Or a situation. This dream indicates that there is some force or person protecting you, and this person will reveal himself and you will find that he is the same person that you love and respect in your life and give him all trust. Sometimes, dreaming of a broken engagement ring indicates your outdated thinking and indicates that There is no way to undo the choices you have made. Seeing an engagement ring broken in a dream You will find yourself involved in some situation and your dream, unfortunately, is a warning of poverty or inability to move

title: Interpretation of seeing an invasion in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing a man entering into an invasion? The meaning of severing ties with the family. What is the purpose of seeing an invasion of the sea? A sign of the fortuneteller’s negligence in some matters. What is the interpretation of a vision of surviving a war? It symbolizes achieving more success and excellence. Interpretation of seeing a profession in a dream? Indication of a major financial loss. Interpretation of seeing war and fear of it? Indication of a bad psychological state. Interpretation of seeing bombing in a dream? That the viewer is exposed to a major financial crisis. Witnessing war and shooting of single people? A sign of being exposed to injustice. Interpretation of seeing an invasion in a dream. Seeing a man entering An invasion in a dream is a sign of severing kinship ties with family and relatives. While seeing an invasion and victory symbolizes a sign of the arrival of good and ample nourishment. But if the fortuneteller sees that he entered into an invasion and was killed for the sake of God, this is evidence that he is making money. When the sleeper sees that he has not been victorious Against the enemies in the conquest, this indicates his lack of faith. If the dreamer sees that he was victorious in the conquest in the dream, this means victory over the enemies. Ibn Sirin sees in the vision of the conquest of the sea a sign of the dreamer’s failure in some matters. Escaping from war in a dreamIf the sleeper sees that Surviving war in a dream, this symbolizes achieving more success and superiority. When you see a pregnant woman escaping from war, it is an indication of changes occurring at work. If a man sees that he is able to escape from war, this indicates the end of problems and disputes. This vision also In a married woman’s dream, it may indicate that she will become pregnant soon, God willing. Seeing a single woman trying to escape from war and finding someone chasing her is a sign of suffering. Al-Nabulsi sees escaping from the war between the rulers and the people as a sign of prosperity. Interpretation of seeing a profession in a dream Ibn Sirin believes that seeing A profession in a dream is a sign of being exposed to a great financial loss. If an unmarried girl sees herself busy in the dream, it indicates a bad psychological state, while if the dreamer sees that he killed the occupation soldiers in a dream, it symbolizes the end of problems and sorrows. Whoever sees in his dream that he is fighting the occupiers, it is evidence of loss. The worries that he suffers from. When the sleeper sees that he has defeated enemies during the takeover, it may indicate following the path of truth. If the dreamer sees that he is facing the occupation soldiers, then this dream is a sign of walking on the right path. Interpretation of a dream of war and attackIf the dreamer sees the battlefield in his dream, This indicates positive changes at work. While the vision of women’s war and violent attack symbolizes a lot of problems and family arguments. But if the Virgin sees a swordsman in the war, this is a sign of marriage with good news. When a married woman sees a war and is attacked, this is a sign that she is hearing news. Good. Anyone who sees himself on the battlefield in a dream indicates the spread of controversy and rumors. To see the dreamer being attacked during war, this indicates a dispute with colleagues. Interpretation of a dream about war and fear. Ibn Sirin showed that seeing war and fear in a dream is a sign of a poor psychological state.

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing howling in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

Interpretation of a dream about screaming on Ibn Sirin: Interpretation of a dream about screaming in a dream as mentioned by Ibn Sirin to indicate feelings of anxiety, tension and fear of something happening in the future. Seeing crying and crying in a dream is evidence that the dreamer's life is changing for the better and his psychological and material condition improves and he overcomes crises and difficulties. The dream that screams to commit a mistake in a dream is one of the desired dreams that indicates a lot of good and the occurrence of many happy occasions. Seeing yourself screaming at a thief in a dream is evidence of the blessing of money, profits, large gains and relief from the priest. The dream of seeing loud screams in a dream may be a result of the dreamer feeling angry The severe reality and must calm down and think. Interpretation of a dream about screaming according to Al-Nabulsi: The interpretation of a dream about crying from a family member in a dream indicates the loss of a person from the same family or the occurrence of a major disaster for a person dear to the visionary. Seeing in a dream that he is screaming, slapping and screaming is evidence of the bad psychological state that the visionary has recently experienced and his inability to get out of it. The dream of crying for rain in a dream indicates health, concealment, well-being and longevity. The dream of screaming and tears in a dream is evidence of alleviating fears, facilitating matters, treating diseases and getting rid of problems. The dream of screaming in the face of a friend in a dream may indicate that you are reaping great benefit from this friend or that you are establishing a partnership with him. Seeing yourself screaming and screaming in a dream indicates hatred and hatred for me or someone close to him. The dream of screaming without a sound in a dream can indicate many problems, pain and severe sadness that the visionary feels. Seeing him screaming in a dream of one of the unpleasant visions means that he is in a state of sadness, anxiety and loneliness. The dream in which you scream at a lover in a dream for an unmarried woman is evidence of her relationship and marriage near him. title: What is the interpretation of hunting in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq?

preview.html: Fishing in a dream, fish are gill-breathing aquatic animals that live in the depths of the sea and vary in their shapes and types, and people feed on them because of their great benefits. Fishing in a dream Interpretation scholars say that if the dreamer sees him catching a fish in a dream, this will lead to providing a very good and abundant livelihood. And if the dreamer sees in his dream that there is difficulty in catching burns, this means that he will earn a lot of money, but after a long period of fatigue and hardship. Also, the dreamer’s dream of catching fish of many scales indicates that he will earn a lot of money, but through illegal means. If the dreamer catches a fish from a well, it indicates his bad qualities and harsh relations with others. But if the dreamer catches a fish with his hand in a dream, this symbolizes a distinguished social life, the expansion of his circle of acquaintances, and the presence of many loyal friends. Fishing in a dream by Ibn Sirin, says Ibn Sirin, may God have mercy on him. God, that the dreamer sees in his dream that he is catching a fish, this indicates the arrival of good news and the pleasure of hearing good words soon. If the dreamer sees himself catching a small fish in a dream, this indicates the many difficulties that he will face that will prevent him from achieving his dreams and ambitions. As for the dreamer who sees fish thorns In a dream, it means that he is losing some valuable things in his life. Also, if the dreamer sees him catching a fish from a very narrow well in a dream, it means that something bad will happen soon and he should be careful. If the fortuneteller falls into the well from catching fish, then he is committing Sins and transgressions and he must repent to God. Seeing a dreamer catching fish from dirty water indicates great financial losses and distress. Fishing in a dream by Imam Al-SadiqImam Al-Sadiq believes that seeing a dreamer in a dream catching fish and eating it means progress in work and achieving the highest positions. And a married man, If he sees himself fishing in a dream, it symbolizes the great happiness that he will enjoy in his life. If an unmarried young man sees himself catching a fish in clear water in a dream, this means that he will soon marry a girl with a good personality. As for the dreamer who sees her catching a small fish in In a dream, it means that he will face some minor problems, but they will end quickly. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is catching salted fish, this means that he will fall into a cycle of debt and needs money. If a woman sees herself catching fish with her hand in a dream, this will lead to her entering In charity work soon. However, when the dreamer sees a dead person giving him fresh fish in a dream, this means that the good news he will receive. What is the interpretation of seeing fishing in a single woman’s dream? If an unmarried girl sees that she is fishing in a dream, she will get a lot of money She was not expecting that. And if the dreamer sees in a dream that he is fishing, he announces to her that many will come to propose to her soon. But if the dreamer sees an unfamiliar person catching a fish in a dream, this means that there is a good person who loves her and wants to associate with her. Also, seeing the dreamer who Y
